channel.title: Checking for upgrades
channel.description:
K, it's been 1 year + 3 months since I got my latest (custom) PC and need some recommendation for what should I upgrade So here's my specs: - Intel Core i3 530 @ 2.93 GHz - Ati Radeon HD 5670 - 4GB RAM - Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit
I realize my graphics card is quite outdated and my top priority to upgrade, but what should I replace it with? And are there any other things that i should make note of?
Thanks in advance

item.title: Checking for upgrades
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
Kairouseki:

24 GBs RAM

Nice, you can run 6 instances of Battlefield 3 at once.

Read full topic

item.title: Checking for upgrades
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

I would guess that if you upgrade your graphics card and nothing else, your memory and CPU aren’t really going to bottleneck it that much. If you’ve got the money, you could go up to to an i5 2500K and 8GB of RAM as well.

Nah, he would have to change the mobo in that case too. Different sockets.

Read full topic

item.title: Checking for upgrades
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
K, it’s been 1 year + 3 months since I got my latest (custom) PC and need some recommendation for what should I upgrade
So here’s my specs:

  • Intel Core i3 530 @ 2.93 GHz
  • Ati Radeon HD 5670
  • 4GB RAM
  • Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit

I realize my graphics card is quite outdated and my top priority to upgrade, but what should I replace it with? And are there any other things that i should make note of?

Thanks in advance
